programme.desc: Episode 114 - Welcome to the Top LOL's Countdown, where we bring you, you guessed it...the top Lols! Hosted by Natalia Bilbao.

programme.title: Top 100 Fails Countdown
programme.desc: Episode 110 - Welcome to the Top 100 Fails Countdown! On this show, the only way to win is to fail. We've got hundreds of fails, but there can be only one final fail winner.

programme.title: AFV's Prank Academy: Pranking Proper
programme.desc: Episode 103 - Hosted by influencers Rachel Mueller and David Bonfadini, Prank Academy features the most hilarious pranks by kids for kids.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Michael Palascak - 1984
programme.desc: Michael Palascak's dry humor shines with riffs on interviewing for a pyramid scheme, living with his parents after college, and how life is way better now than in 1984.

programme.title: Collin Moulton - Anti-Animal Vegan
programme.desc: Collin is one of the most fun, personable, and sought after headliners today. He has had his own stand-up special on SHOWTIME, he's been on NICKELODEON, and was recently featured on LAST CALL WITH CARSON DALY. Touring for over 15 years Collin has gained an ease and enjoyment on stage that makes every show worth watching.America knows and loves him. His familiarity and energy engages and relieves the audience before he even speaks. His electric storytelling style makes you care about every topic he explores. Collin's comedy is the release needed from our every day lives. Come needing to laugh tonight, leave wanting to laugh forever!Collin Moulton

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Jordan Makin - The BFFG
programme.desc: Born and raised in the heart of Utah County, Jordan Makin had to compensate for his red hair and uneventful childhood by learning to be funny. His unique observations will make you laugh and his stories about feeling awkward will help you appreciate your life more. He has worked with many comedy greats, such as Marc Maron, Ryan Hamilton, and Drew Lynch. His comedy has been featured at the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival and the Idaho Laugh Fest. Jordan is the co-creator and co-host of The Happy Valley Podcast.

programme.title: Moody Molavi - Remove Before Flight
programme.desc: The christian comic is married to his high school sweetheart, who later became his stepsister through the marriage of their parents to each other. That’s where the fun begins as Moody skillfully shares his life experiences.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Mark Christopher Lawrence - Clean Outta Compton
programme.desc: Mark Christopher Lawrence (born May 22, 1964) is an American character actor, stand-up comedian, and voice-over artist. He is perhaps best known for his role as esoteric D.J., Tone Deaf, in the 1994 satirical rap mockumentary, Fear of a Black Hat. He has co-starred in popular films such as Terminator 2: Judgment Day, Planet of the Apes, Lost Treasure and The Pursuit of Happiness. Lawrence can currently be seen in his regular role as Big Mike on the NBC series Chuck. He has made guest appearances on many television programs, most notably Heroes, My Name Is Earl, Crossing Jordan, Dharma & Greg, Malcolm in the Middle, Touched by an Angel, Malcolm & Eddie, Men Behaving Badly, Seinfeld, Murphy Brown, and Martin. He is also featured on the Radio Series Adventures in Odyssey as "Ed Washington".

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Chris Voth - Cashmere
programme.desc: Chris Voth is an accomplished comedian, a licensed teacher, and a published author. Voth made his debut late-night television appearance on the Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson. He also appeared in three seasons of NBC's Last Comic Standing and was chosen for the prestigious Great American Comedy Festival. A 15-year comedy veteran, Voth is a past winner of the Denver Comedy Works Competition and has worked with everyone from Dave Chappelle to Larry the Cable Guy to Linda Ronstadt. Voth’s first comedy CD titled "Never Mind the Jim J Bullocks, Here's the Chris Voth" is currently available for purchase. Chris currently balances his performance schedule with his full-time high-school teaching career. You can read his short story, "Stand Up and Deliver," published in the Cream City Review Literary Journal. In it, Chris shares the experiences he had when entering the teaching field after years in stand-up comedy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Rex Havens - Women & Children First
programme.desc: Rex has been delighting comedy audiences for 20 years, in world-famous comedy clubs like The Improv, Catch-A-Rising Star, Funny Bones and Zanies, on television for Showtime, Comedy Central and Comic Relief, on radio with Bob & Tom and NPR, cruise ships worldwide, and corporate clients including GM, American Express, Texaco, 3M, Coca-Cola, IBM, Toshiba, Lowe’s, Johnson & Johnson, Ameritech, Proctor & Gamble, State Farm, Quaker Oats, Verizon and the IRS (“Working for the IRS is the only sure way to get money from them.”), and numerous non-profit and charitable organizations, such as St. Jude’s and the Make-A-Wish Foundation. A former college professor who made the unusual transition to the standup comedy stage in the ’80’s, Rex has always believed that laughter is the best defense against a confusing and challenging world. Rex’s take on marriage and family has propelled him to performances in all 50 states and around the world, including London, Hong Kong, Amsterdam, Bermuda, Montreal, Barcelona, Copenhagen, Aruba, Rome and Cannes.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Jeff Jena - Old Dog, New Jokes
programme.desc: Jeffrey Jena is one of the top corporate and cruise comics working today. His thirty-three years of live performance experience and over forty national television shows, both as an actor and comic give him the ability to work for any audience

programme.title: Tim Young - What World is This?
programme.desc: Tim headlines clubs all over North America, has performed on over 500 college campuses as well as comedy festivals in New York, Montreal, and Seattle, and he's a fixture in the New York City club scene. He was a finalist on NBCs Last Comic Standing, has appeared on Comedy Centrals Premium Blend, Tough Crowd, and Shorties, and you may have seen him as a commentator on VH1, MTV, TLC and the E! Channel.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Steve Mazan - Humblebragger
programme.desc: Steve Mazan shot out of the famous San Francisco scene that produced comedy legends such as Robin Williams and Dana Carvey. In his decade-plus career, Steve has done stand-up everywhere from clubs and colleges across the country to corporate events, cruises, and many television shows including The Late Show with David Letterman. He even won an Emmy for his work writing on The Ellen Degeneres Show. His clean and clever comedy landed him on Letterman, The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, The Bob & Tom Radio Show, Sirius/XM Radio and more. He’s even done audience warm-up for shows such as Deal or No Deal. But of all the performances Steve has done, he is most proud of his eight trips to Iraq and Afghanistan to perform for our troops. He’s also the subject of the award-winning film “Dying to do Letterman.”

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Shayne Smith - Alligator Boys
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Shayne Smith delivers more stories about everything from a failed robbery to a wrestling match in the New York Subway and even saving the life of a dog in his second original Dry Bar Comedy special, “Alligator Boys."

programme.title: Digley and Dazey Save The Day

programme.title: The Cloud - Episode 301
programme.desc: A storm is brewing over Knighton. Monstrox has taken the form of a cloud, and is raising an army of lightning infused Stone Monsters. His first target is the new Lavalands Amusement Park. Harmony reigns in Knighton as the Knights pursue their civilian lives: Lance has a TV talk show Axl is the singing chef on the show Jestro is the weatherman Clay is teaching at the Knights' Academy Macy, Ava and Merlok 2.0 travel the land in the Fortrex making sure the kingdom's defenses are ready (part of a plan she and Clay have) Aaron and his hover shield is travelling the land setting extreme records. Robin is at his workshop at the Knights' Academy doing an "independent study" - he's working on some top secret project for Merlok 2.0. It all seems excellent! We even see the Knights new vehicles - which have been optimized for civilian life (except for Clay's.) But storm clouds are brewing. Well, one storm cloud is brewing: the Cloud of Monstrox! Yes, the Book of Monsters has reconstituted himself and is now a cloud who needs a man on the ground to enact his new evil plan. He follows his old buddy Jestro as he goes across the realm on the weekends apologizing for being evil. ZAP! With one bolt of his evil magic lighting, the Cloud of Monstrox turns Jestro evil again (only this time a bit, well, too evil.) The evil duo are back together - and bring stone to life for the first time in the form of Gargoyles from the town of GHOULIA. Now they must gather the Forbidden Powers so that the Cloud of Monstrox can destroy the entire kingdom! A battle breaks out in the Lava Lands, where Lance and Alice Squires are reporting from the opening of the Cuthbert Richmond funded Lava Lands Amusement Park, rebuilt from the remains of Jestro's old HQ. Jestro and the Cloud are after something in the remains and as Merlok 2.0 sends out a call for the Knights to help Lance. Can Lance (with an assist from King Halbert in his Mech) hold-off Jestro, the Cloud and their new army of stone fighters?!

programme.title: The Island Of Darkness
programme.desc: After battling off Garmadon's Stone Army, the Ninjas finally arrive at the Temple of Light where they harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd who becomes more powerful than he ever imagined. The Ninja camouflage the Bounty, creating a secret rebel base on the island. Misako says they must find the Temple of Light, because only when their elemental powers return, will they be strong enough to defeat the indestructible Stone Army. The Ninja search the dark, exotic island and come across Garmadon's compound, where they're building the Super-Weapon. The Ninja discover the Temple of Light is hidden at the highest peak of the island, and the Tinkerer aids their trek in creating a Drill Dozer so they can travel underground unnoticed. A final chase and battle takes place at the Temple of Light, as the Ninja solve the puzzle and harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd, who also becomes more powerful then he ever imagined. Their new abilities can destroy the indestructible Stone Warriors. Although Lord Garmadon finds this to be a setback, the Overlord reassures him darkness will prevail, as we end on seeing the Celestial Clock ticking down closer to zero.

programme.title: A Little Rusty - Episode 302
programme.desc: The Cloud of Monstrox and Jestro unlocks a mysterious Forbidden Power. What kind ofhavoc will they unleash? And can Merlok 2.0 and the NEXO KNIGHTS make the new COMBO NEXO Powers work? The Knights finally make it to the Lava Lands - using their various new forms of transport, which are all strictly civilian vechicles - and they must regroup and learn to fight together again to face the new threat of Jestro, the Cloud of Monstrox, and their STONE MONSTERS (in this case, Stone Gargoyles.) But Jestro and his monsters beat back the knights and recover the STAFF OF MONSTROX - which was buried under the ceremonial chamber from Episode 210 (and is now the Lava Puker amusement park ride) - and they get away on Jestro's EVIL MOBILE, which he recovers from the HQ garage. Macy says this is exactly why she's been touring the kingdom preparing everyone for the next attack. The Knights have to get it together because now the entire kingdom is under threat...again. Robin decides he must upgrade the Knights' vehicles and make them more "fight optimized." Ava and Merlok 2.0 must figure out how to use new NEXO Powers because regular NEXO Powers do make Stone monsters back into stone, but the Cloud simply zaps them to life again. Meanwhile, in the IRON MOUNTAINS, Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find the first of the Forbidden Powers: RELENTLESS RUST. They find the ROGUL STATUE holding the power and zap him to life. Now...they can rust those shiny knights to pieces! Ava and Merlok are attempting to use NEXO COMBO POWERS - with hilarious results - as they try to figure out how they might work. When Jestro attacks, he's able to halt the Fortrex by instantly rusting its tracks and wheels! Robin has his hands full trying to clean all the rust from the attack of Relentless Rust. As the Knights attempt to defend against Jestro, the Cloud is zapping statues to life. He hits a statue with a bolt of lightning as Clay is touching it. Something happens...Clay feels odd stiff as if rock is mixing with his body. Finally, Ava and Merlok 2.0 download to the Knights their new thing: a COMBO NEXO COMBO Power. It works! It can smash the animated statues to dust! They use it to defeat Jestro, but he and the Cloud get away with the Forbidden Power of Relentless Rust. Victory ... sort of. Clay talks to Merlok 2.0...something has happened to him. What can they do? Merlok 2.0 is very concerned.

programme.title: The Last Hope
programme.desc: When the Ninjas' attempt to return Garmadon's 'Helmet of Darkness' to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago. With the Overlord and Garmadon nearing completion of the Super-Weapon, Misako tells the group she thinks there could be one last chance at preventing Lloyd's final battle with his father. She believes if they can steal the helmet off Garmadon's head and return it to it's rightful perch on the Celestial Clock, it could stop the clock before it reaches zero, thus preventing the final battle from beginning. Dressed as Warriors, the Ninja escort their 'captive' Misako to Garmadon, and the heroes see glimpses of the Super-Weapon being built. In a thrilling escape, Misako cleverly steals Garmadon's helmet, and they race to the Celestial Clock. Lloyd has a brief encounter with his father, and hesitates striking him. When they return the helmet to its rightful perch, they're one second too late, allowing the clock to reach zero, and for it to focus a beam of concentrated light from the sky into the Super-Weapon. Nya is taken hostage, as the others fall off a cliff, barely surviving the fall. The Ninja have failed -- the final battle has begun.

programme.title: Thunderstox - Episode 303
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox encounters the sculptor. He helps unleash a horde of fierce garden gnomes on Knighton. What will the NEXO KNIGHTS do against this new enemy? Will their new COMBO NEXO Powers do the trick? As Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox head off on the Evil Mobile to 'store' the Forbidden Power in a secret location, they encounter...THE SCULPTOR. His real name is ROBERTO ARNOLDI. He's a sensitive and odd artist who has been laid off by the king (the King ordered a "smashing" statue of the Queen, and the Sculptor made a statue of the Queen literally smashing monsters. He takes everything very literally.) Jestro instructs him to make a "bad" statue that he can use to attack the knights. The Sculptor sets to work. Meanwhile, the NEXO KNIGHTS are discussing the COMBO NEXO Powers, the Forbidden Powers, and what all this means. Lance, meanwhile, decides that since his talk show career is on hold, he thinks he'll install cameras in the Fortrex and do a Big Brother-like expose show on the Knights (he decides NOT to tell the others.) Merlok 2.0 and the Cloud of Monstrox (each talking to their cohorts) explain the history of the Forbidden Powers: it's a history lesson about the WIZARDS' COUNCIL, the Forbidden Powers, and how they were stopped long ago. This visual montage leads Jestro to...MOUNT THUNDERSTROX. The Cloud of Monstrox shows him the circle of ten Standing Stones where he will insert the Forbidden Powers. "What'll happen after that?" asks Jestro, curious. "Oh, I don't want to spoil the surprise," says the Cloud. They insert the first Forbidden Power, Relentless Rust, and it locks into place on its stone. They go off to battle the Knights and collect the "bad" statue the sculptor is making. But he's made a literally bad statue...it's terrible ... garden gnomes. Like an amateur art student. And...it's not even finished. ("You can't rush bad genius!") The Knights attack with their newly modified vehicles and they succeed in destroying the Evil Mobile. They then try to use a COMBO NEXO Power, but can't...it had to be perfect to work (Ava and Merlok need to work on it.) As Jestro and the Cloud retreat, Merlok again talks to Clay about turning to stone! Merlok calls in Robin...he will need him to build something to help Clay as he becomes more and more impaired.

programme.title: Return Of The Overlord
programme.desc: When Garmadon uses his new Super-Weapon to turn Jamakai Village evil, he unwittingly unsettles the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possesses his body. Lord Garmadon witnesses the Super-Weapon come to life, revealing it to be 'Garma-Tron', a giant moving cannon. His first test subject is Nya. Meanwhile, the heroes prepare for the final battle and sneak-attack Garmadon's compound...only to find it empty. The Super-Weapon is moving towards the coastline, where the cannon's range can reach Ninjago. On the way there, the Ninja must face off with Evil Nya, turned dark from the Super-Weapon. On the coastline, Lloyd battles his father atop Garma-Tron. The battle is fierce, but Lloyd fails at stopping his father from firing Garma-Tron, turning Jamanakai Village evil. Garmadon naively celebrates, not realizing he's undone the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possess his body. And as the Overlord continues to get more powerful, a hideous metamorphosis is taking place. Lloyd must fight the Overlord, and just when it looks like good will prevail, Lloyd is injured and thrown to the ground. In the end, the villains escape through a portal to Ninjago, and our heroes are abandoned on the island with no way home. And with the Green Ninja injured, it looks like all is lost. Evil has won.

programme.title: Rotten Luck - Episode 304
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox unleashes the Forbidden Power Ravaging Rot on Knighton! Turning everything into green gooey rot. But Robin has an awesome new invention that could help the NEXO KNIGHTS Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find a second Forbidden Power near the falling down Swamp Castle: RAVAGING ROT. With this power, they can make everything in the kingdom rot - food, vegetation, anything that grows or is natural. And that's exactly what they do! It's awful and makes everything stink. The Sculptor start to sculpt a portable HeadQuarter for his master, Jestro. Jestro expects it to be done when they return from ravaging the land. Axl is very concerned - he's into organic food ... and now food starts to rot. Merlok 2.0 and Ava are continuing to work on perfecting the COMBO NEXO Powers. We see display screens of MANY of the NEXO Powers. But there's a huge power consumption issue with these new-fangled combos. "I'll have to find an algorithmic power curve consumption solution, magic man," says Ava. "I always just sort of choose them by, uh, feel." "What do you feel like?" "Uh, a ham sandwich, a banana, and dragon fire," responds Merlok. "That produced a combo with 2% efficiency," says Ava. "This is why we have to actually THINK about and study perfec Combos. We need automatic power integration." The Knights must stop Jestro from rotting all the food and living plant matter in Knighton and Axl leads the charge. But as they finally confront Jestro, who's trying to rot a field of beans near Fruitbridge, they're hit by his finally completed ROLLING HQ (the Sculptor is proud of the "artsy" elements.) ... it's not exactly perfect though ... he took the idea of Head Quarter a little too litteral and created a big head. Finally, in this conclusive battle where the knights get strapped on a rotting bridge, Clay emerges in a sleek, new BATTLE SUIT that Robin built for him because he was starting to have trouble moving around (the whole turning to stone thing.) It's smaller and more high-tech than the bigger Mechs of the past. Clay's able to drive Jestro off. Jestro, at the end of the episode, puts the Forbidden Power of Ravaging Rot into Mount Thunderstrox. Meanwhile, back at the Fortrex, Axl makes an organic food feast for all his fellow Knights.

programme.title: Rise Of The Snakes
programme.desc: The four Ninja are snapped out of their post-hero complacency when Lord Garmadon's young son Lloyd shows up and tries to pick up where his father left off. The Ninja dismiss him as a threat, but regret that choice after Lloyd wakes up the evil snake tribe. A prophecy is revealed that states a green ninja will ultimately defeat Lord Garmadon.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 1 - Episode 101
programme.desc: When Jestro the Jester finds the Book of Monsters, chaos breaks loose in the Kingdom of Knighton. Can the newly graduated Knights from the Knights' Academy save the kingdom? It's final graduation fighting exams for the latest Knights from Knights' Academy. All our new Knights demonstrate their prowess: CLAY, AARON, AXL and LANCE. PRINCESS MACY get to join them, but her father doesn't want her to graduate. As part of the entertainment, MERLOK does an amazing magic trick. His act is followed by...JESTRO, the King's Jester. He's terrible (and he should know to never follow a better act.) Everyone laughed because he's a real joke....a total failure. While Jestro roams the halls fo the King's Castle, forlorn, he hears the BOOK OF MONSTERS calling to him from Merlok's library. The book talks Jestro into gathering as many books of spells as he can carry, but they're interrupted by...Clay! As Jestro quickly pages through the Book of Monsters to attack Clay, Merlok arrives. There's a battle in the library between Jestro and Merlok. Finally, the wizard summons up his most powerful spell in self-defence. BOOM! There's a big, magical explosion and when Clay forces his way back into the library, Merlok, Jestro and the magic books are...GONE!

programme.title: New Girl In Town - Episode 1
programme.desc: When the World Petacular comes to Heartlake City and is almost ruined before it's even started, five feisty girls unite, despite their differences, using their creativity to save the day. Best friends Olivia, Andrea, Emma, Mia and Stephanie reside in HeartLake City but didn't know each other - that is until the World Petacular brought them together! On the eve of the biggest event Heartlake City hosts, disaster and chaos is abound. New-in-town Olivia is helping her veterinarian Aunt Sophie with her mobile clinic. But when she's put in charge of training a scruffy puppy named Scarlet, the puppy runs amuck, leaving a trail of destruction as she collides with Andrea, ruins Emma's banner and Stephanie's cakes, and finally spooks Mia's horse Bella who bucks Mia off and sprints away. The girls quickly unite, helping each-other to save the day and most importantly have fun along the way!

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Back in training mode with the looming threat of Lloyd and the Hypnobrai, Zane wanders after a Falcon and lands himself in a heap of trouble. The rest of the Ninja leave the training dojo to help him and return to find that the snakes have burned it to the ground.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 2 - Episode 102
programme.desc: Realizing they must defend the Kingdom from Jestro's monsters, the Knights try to organize but are despondent when they discover their best advisor - Merlok the Magician - has sacrificed himself to save them. When Jestro awakens, he's been blasted miles and miles away from the King's Castle by Merlok's explosive spell. And, it seems, all the books he was trying to steal have been scattered, too. The Book of Monsters broke Jestro' fall and now he can use the book to attack the people who laughed at him. Meanwhile, the King and his newly-trained Knights pick through the rubble of Merlok's library. They'll have to figure something out, because Jestro and his newly made magic monsters attack King's Castle! Clay organizes the Knights to defend the kingdom, but they've never worked together before. It takes all their training, plus the help of an old friend...MERLOK! Only now he's MERLOK 2.0. Ava has been piecing together what happened and discovering that the "ghost in the machine" she's been chasing is really Merlok in digital form. Now, he can use his magic digitally and he downloads just the right weapons to the struggling Knights! They finally foil Jestro's attack with Merlok's help and officially become NEXO KNIGHTS!

programme.title: Stephanie's Surprise Party -Episode 2
programme.desc: When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they soon discover that it's not easy keeping their plans secret from Stephanie who becomes suspicious when none of the girls have time to hang out. When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they discover that it's not easy keeping their plans a secret. As the girls choreograph a dance routine, magic show and search for the perfect present and cake, Stephanie becomes aware that her friends are avoiding her on her birthday and excluding her from their activities... Little does she know that her friends are secretly preparing a surprise pool party for her! Once the surprise is revealed Stephanie realises how much her friends care about her and the importance of friendship.

programme.title: Snakebit
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe - The Fangpyres - to help him regain control. The Ninja are busy setting up their new HQ that Zane discovered, but are called to duty when the Fangpyres attack the village where Jay's family lives.

programme.title: The Power Of Merlok - Episode 103
programme.desc: When Jestro attacks a village on the far side of the Kingdom, the NEXO-Knights wonder how they'll get there. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RV...maybe they can "mod" that for their own, "knightly" use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rolling...in THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. "Of course I'm the leader...I'm a Richmond."

programme.title: Dolphin Cruise -Episode 3
programme.desc: Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a science contest at school and win a trip on a luxury yacht but not everything goes as planned when they set out to sea. When Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a school science contest and win a Dolphin sight-seeing trip, not everything goes to plan...As the girls set out to sea on a luxury yacht, misunderstandings and disagreements occur which become secondary when they discover a pod of dolphins in danger. The girls learn that they have to compromise and trust in each other if they are to save the dolphins and their trip out to sea...

programme.title: Never Trust A Snake
programme.desc: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor - the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe. Pythor lures Lloyd under his spell and steals a map from him that will show him where the remaining two snakes tribes dwell and Uncle Sensei saves Lloyd from doom.

programme.title: The Knights Code - Episode 104
programme.desc: Jestro uses the Book of Chaos to unleash, um, chaos and attack the King's hover train to try and kidnap the royal party. Can the NEXO-Knights bring order out of the chaos and save the King? Jestro finds the Book of Chaos in the countryside and decides he must feed it to the book. The Book of Monsters actually tells Jestro NOT to feed it to him he tells Jestro he's not ready for that kind of power. But Jestro doesn't listen. Now the Book unleashes chaotic monsters and Jestro uses them to attack the King and his party who are on a business-related tour of the kingdom. When the NEXO-Knights show up to stop the monster attacks and realize that they must save King and Queen Halbert - Macy's parents - from the chaotic evil monsters that have been unleashed. Clay asserts himself as leader and brings order to the knights from the chaos. He has his own book: the Book of the Knight's Code. They should all live by it.

programme.title: Country Girls - Episode 4
programme.desc: When the girls go to Mia's grandparents' ranch and Olivia accidentally knocks down the neighbor's barn, the girls promise to raise money to rebuild it and now have to learn to set aside their differences and work together to make good on their promise. Mia invites her friends to her grandparents' ranch for the weekend. But when Olivia accidentally knocks down a neighbor's barn with a tractor, the girls promise to raise the money to rebuild it themselves. Complicating matters, Mia and Stephanie turn out to like the same boy, Martin. They'll have to learn to set aside their differences and work together if they're going to raise enough money to make good on their promise.

programme.title: The Snake King
programme.desc: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer - an ancient beast who can't be killed and will consume all of Ninjago. We find out Nya is the Samurai and Lloyd is taken prisoner by the snake tribes.

programme.title: Fright Knight - Episode 105
programme.desc: Using the Book of Fear, Jestro calls forth Whipperella and uses her to trap the knights in the dark woods where they realize their darkest fears. Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds "The Book of Fear." It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her "knighmarish" power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest - as they fight off the Whipperella - that they we find out Aaron's true fear - the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.

programme.title: Emma's Dilemma - Episode 5
programme.desc: When Stephanie becomes obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in a float building contest and accidentally disregards Emma's ideas and design, Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to get revenge on Stephanie. When the girls enter a float-building contest, Emma is especially excited to share her design idea for the float. But no one is listening to her, especially Stephanie, who's become obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in the contest. Emma finally does find someone who appreciates her design... Tanya! Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to build the float design. But is Tanya just using Emma to get revenge on Stephanie?

programme.title: Tick Tock
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: The Golden Castle - Episode 106
programme.desc: When Lance is cast as the star in the new remake of the classic movie "Ned Knightly and the Golden Castle" he doesn't anticipate Jestro and his monsters invading the set and ruining his starring role. It's movie time! Lance does something very Lance: he agrees to star in a movie about remake of a classic film in Knighton: "The Golden Castle." While pillaging a village, Jestro and the Book of Monsters see a movie poster for "The Golden Castle" and the book says the legendary Golden Castle is filled with riches! Jestro explains that it's just a dumb movie and that it's not real. It's all based on a "script." The Book, who's been shelved for many years, wants to eat the movie script to learn more about the modern world. On the set of the movie, Lance has invited the other Knights to act as extras. When they see how Lance is being portrayed, they're incensed. When Jestro attacks the movie set to get the script for his book to eat, the film director keeps rolling. This battle footage is fantastic! The Knights defeat Jestro even though the movie set is trashed. The director will make it work. At the premier of the movie, Lance is embarrassed to see that he's been reduced to comic relief for the realm's bravest Knight...Macy! The director has now made her a star.

programme.title: EvanTubeHD | Sibling Skirmishes!
programme.desc: Share in the fun with YouTube star EvanTubeHD, his sister JillianTubeHD, and the whole Tube Family!

programme.title: HobbyKidsTV | 48 Hours of Fun!
programme.desc: Come along for the fun with popular YouTube family, HobbyKidsTV! Plus, HobbyKids Adventures!

programme.title: EvanTubeHD | Drive-Thru's and DNA!
programme.desc: Share in the fun with YouTube star EvanTubeHD, his sister JillianTubeHD, and the whole Tube Family!

programme.title: HobbyKidsTV | Froggy Friends!
programme.desc: Come along for the fun with popular YouTube family, HobbyKidsTV! Plus, HobbyKids Adventures!

programme.title: Challenge Squad | Fried Popcorn?!
programme.desc: Challenge Squad takes on the most epic challenges, featuring your favorite YouTube stars!

programme.title: Terror in the Skies
programme.desc: Journey to the heartland of the Midwest and explore a wave of sightings of a shapeless creature.

programme.desc: The ancient teachings of secret societies hold the most powerful truths and secrets in the world.

programme.title: Bible Secrets: The Forbidden Codes
programme.desc: Discover the sacred codes, profound mysteries and hidden secrets in the Bible.

programme.title: On the Trail of Bigfoot: The Search
programme.desc: A documentarian joins the Ohio Night Stalkers as they seek evidence of Bigfoot's existence.

programme.title: Alien Artifacts: The Lost World
programme.desc: Explore the existence of artifacts so technologically advanced they defy comprehension.

programme.title: Titanic II
programme.desc: On the 100th anniversary of the original voyage, a modern luxury liner christened "Titanic II," follows the path of its namesake. But when a tsunami hurls an ice berg into the new ship's path, the passengers and crew must fight to avoid a similar fate.

programme.title: Trolland
programme.desc: Fenn the Troll hates the Troll pastime of pranking, and is teased so much for it that he runs away. But when a long-suffering park ranger starts capturing the other Trolls, it's up to Fenn to rescue his family and friends - without pranking.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: In February 1942 US forces engaged an unidentified flying object above Los Angeles. Now almost 70 years later, the alien invaders have returned.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E2 | America's First Alien Abduction
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a man who paints a mountain in California, America's first alien abduction, as well as the stories about Gettysburg that your teachers left out.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E3 | The Handprint in the Jail Cell
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a war between mobsters over artichokes, as well as the story of an innocent man facing execution who leaves behind a handprint on his cell's wall that won't go away.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E4 | Aliens in New England
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a British priest who dressed as a mermaid, a father and son who created over 3,000 glass flowers, and a small town in New England that was besieged by UFOs.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E5 | Oddities in Pennsylvania
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a museum of medical oddities, three friends whose fates are all tied to the Battle of Gettysburg, as well as the town of Punxsutawney and their celebrated groundhog.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E3 | The Death of A.R.T.
programme.desc: The crew prepares a video to broadcast to anyone that might be listening in space. ART gets knocked off the ship and then saves the crew when a planet starts to form around the ship.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E4 | Ted Talks
programme.desc: Tina finds a way to get dumped by her Earthbound boyfriend despite having no contact with Earth. The ship turns out to be infested with spyware, but not the way you would think.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E5 | Trouble's Brewing
programme.desc: Kent, Art and Natasha demand human privileges, but a coffee maker hijacks their robot revolution and takes over the ship. Meanwhile, time distortion turns Tina and Michael's half-day mission into a year-long ordeal on a barren planet.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E6 | Powerless
programme.desc: With the ship trapped in a lightning storm, Karen struggles to persuade the crew to limit their power usage, while Stewart learns to pilot the ship manually with help from Zalian. Meanwhile, Kent attempts to re-educate Natasha, who has been reduced to the mental age of a child after the first lightning strike.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E7 | First Contact
programme.desc: An alien appears in Stewart's dreams, but only seems to communicate if Stewart's dreams are erotic in nature. Stewart enlists both A.R.T. and Zalian's medicine cabinet in a dark, humiliating journey to make first contact. Karen slaps Michael in a rage over his tryst with Tina, and has to go undergo HR arbitration, overseen by an un-objective Tina.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E8 | Finale
programme.desc: The crew makes contact with an alien at long last, but this historic moment is cut short when they realize they have a chance to make it home through an interplanetary ripple. Stewart and Michael decide to stay behind to learn more about the alien's culture, only to be underwhelmed - when they return, Karen chews them out for their mistake. Meanwhile, Tina uses Zalian, A.R.T., holograms, sedatives, and magnets to give Kent and Natasha their first and only date. Both groups are ripped from their activities by a series of shocking revelations about the universe.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Drama
programme.desc: There may be one defining human feature across the planet and it may be our love of drama.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Horror
programme.desc: Science fiction is scary. These films prove that. Keep the lights on.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E6 | The Thief Taker
programme.desc: Explore the stories of a man who painstakingly recreates miniature historic figures, and an English gentleman who would find stolen items for a small fee but turned out to be the thief.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E7 | The Bones of 'Mad' Anthony Wayne
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a Revolutionary War general who received an unusual burial, the sprawling history of ice cream, and a town in Southern California that is the center of the world.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E8 | The Johnstown Flood
programme.desc: We explore the stories of one of the deadliest disasters in American history, as well as an elephant-shaped building and its interesting history on a seaside town.

programme.title: Quantum Voyage
programme.desc: A high school student experiences hallucinations as she starts to witness the collapse of space and time.

programme.title: No One Heard The Scream
programme.desc: A high-class escort witnesses her new neighbor trying to dispose of his wife's corpse.

programme.title: Challenge The Devil
programme.desc: A group of dropouts find an old man in a castle who turns into the Devil and seizes them.

programme.title: Outerman
programme.desc: The fictional hero Outer Man actually lands in Japan, promising to protect the world from the forces of evil.

programme.title: Attack of the Giant Teacher
programme.desc: A night school teacher and an alien beast rampage in a toe-to-toe battle.

programme.title: The Age Of Blood
programme.desc: His duty is to protect the king, at any cost. They want a revolution. Blood will be spilt.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers (2011)
programme.desc: The young hero D'Artagnan (Logan Lerman) and three of France's most elite warriors battle their way across Europe to save king and country from a conspiracy led by deadly assassin Milady (Milla Jovovich) & the Duke of Buckingham (Orlando Bloom). A modern update to Alexander Dumas' classic story, The Three Musketeers is an explosive action adventure Ignatiy Vishnevetsky of Ebert Presents: At The Movies calls, "over-the-top entertainment."

programme.title: Stronger (2017)
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in the inspiring true story of the real life 2013 Boston Marathon bombing survivor Jeff Bauman.

programme.title: The Darkest Hour (2011)
programme.desc: A group of young people hide out in a nightclub when aliens start to invade the planet. They eventually emerge to discover that they may be the only survivors left on earth.

programme.title: The Secret Lives of Dorks
programme.desc: When cheerleader Carrie realizes that dorky Payton's crush is likely to last 'til middle age, she sets him up with a dorkette from school. Sadly, Payton is a dating disaster area.

programme.title: Awful Nice
programme.desc: Mishaps and misadventures hamper two quarrelling brothers' mission to renovate and flip the lake house they inherited from their deceased father.

programme.title: The Ladies Man
programme.desc: After being jilted by his gal, Herbert swears off romance and is determined to live his life as a confirmed bachelor. However, he then finds employment at a Hollywood boardinghouse for women, and the female residents go wild over the new help!

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: This Oscar®-nominated film has the legendary Cary Grant as a government attorney who can't seem to shake his bad fortune. Living on a houseboat, widowed and left with three unruly kids, he hires Sophia Loren as a governess.

programme.title: The Court Jester
programme.desc: Danny Kaye plays kind-hearted entertainer Hawkins who disguises himself as the legendary king of jesters, Giacomo. Hawkins infiltrates the court of the evil villain Basil Rathbone, but when a sorceress hypnotizes him, royal chaos ensues.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: George Eastman is a poor young man determined to win a place in society and the heart of a beautiful socialite (Elizabeth Taylor). Shelley Winters plays the factory girl whose dark secret threatens Eastman’s professional and romantic prospects.

programme.title: Little John
programme.desc: An estranged father's failing health forces a reunion between a judge and the child she gave up for adoption. Stars Ving Rhames, Gloria Reuben, Patty Duke, and Robert Bailey, Jr. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Loving Leah
programme.desc: When Leah's husband Benjamin dies suddenly, Benjamin's brother Jake is stunned to learn he is expected to marry Leah to carry on the name. Jake suggests to Leah that they get married and maintain a secretly platonic relationship.

programme.title: A Way Back Home
programme.desc: When a young musician returns to his hometown at Christmastime, he repairs old wounds and learns the power of forgiveness. Inspired by the paintings of Norman Rockwell. Stars Danny Glover, Austin Stowell and Kayla Ewell.

programme.title: Front of the Class
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Brad Cohen, who, after being challenged by Tourette's syndrome from a very young age, defies all odds to become a gifted teacher.

programme.title: Midway to Love
programme.desc: When the network announces that her television therapy show is changing to a tabloid shock-fest, a caring psychologist returns to her hometown and reunites with her high school sweetheart. Stars Rachel Hendrix, Daniel Stine.

programme.title: Crossroads: A Story of Forgiveness
programme.desc: Bruce Murakami discovers that the tragic accident that killed his wife and daughter was the result of a street racing incident.

programme.title: Buffalo '66
programme.desc: Billy kidnaps a dancer and forces her to pretend to be his wife in order to impress his dysfunctional family.

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: Tells the intriguing and highly seductive story behind one of Vermeer’s greatest and most enigmatic paintings.

programme.title: Blue Valentine
programme.desc: The relationship of a contemporary married couple, charting their evolution over a span of years by cross-cutting between time periods.

programme.title: Buffalo '66
programme.desc: Billy kidnaps a dancer and forces her to pretend to be his wife in order to impress his dysfunctional family.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: When Nathan discovers the people who raised him are not his parents, he begins to uncover unsettling secrets.

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: A master magician named Eisenheim (Edward Norton) vies with Crown Prince Leopold (Rufus Sewell) of Vienna for the hand of noblewoman Sophie (Jessica Biel), the girl he once loved. He brings his considerable powers to bear on the prince, as she is about to be named royal fiancee. However, a police inspector named Uhl (Paul Giamatti) tries to warn Eisenheim that he is playing a very dangerous game.

programme.title: Steel Frontier
programme.desc: A story of a gunfighter who goes after a band of marauders that is terrorizing and killing indiscriminately.

programme.title: New Rose Hotel
programme.desc: Two businessmen are hired to steal secrets from a rival, so they decide to use a beautiful call girl to do so.

programme.title: Passion Fish
programme.desc: After an accident leaves her a paraplegic, a former soap opera star (Mary McDonnell) struggles to recover until she meets her newest nurse (Alfre Woodard), who has struggles of her own.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: Confederate veteran John Chandler (Alan Ladd) returns from defeat in war to find his home razed, his wife dead and his young son, David (David Ladd), traumatized and rendered mute. Desperate to cure the boy, Chandler takes David to a small town in Illinois where he hopes to find a doctor. But, soon after the pair arrives, Chandler finds himself framed for assault -- and forced to choose between serving hard time and working for struggling local farmer Linnett Moore (Olivia de Havilland).

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: A girl (Jennifer Connelly) must solve a dangerous labyrinth and rescue her brother when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King (David Bowie).

programme.title: Wargames (1983)
programme.desc: The fate of mankind rests in the hands of a teenager (Matthew Broderick) who accidentally taps into the Defense Department's tactical computer. Dabney Coleman and Ally Sheedy co-star.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Two thrill-seeking adventurers cross paths with a beautiful doctor and they find themselves on the ultimate hunt for a treasure that claims all who seek it.

programme.title: Electra Woman and Dyna Girl
programme.desc: Electra Woman & Dyna Girl stars YouTube sensations Grace Helbig and Hannah Hart as a crime-fighting duo that take their super persons and crime-fighting chops up a notch when they move from small-town Ohio to the glitz and glamour of Los Angeles.

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a plague of bizarre, puzzling murders grip London, young Holmes and his new found friend Watson find themselves unwittingly entangled in the dark mystery.

programme.title: The Legend of the Red Dragon
programme.desc: It takes a father-and-son team to battle the forces of evil throughout China, fighting with honor to defend the weak through fast-motion Kung Fu. Starring Jet Li and Chingmy Yau. Subtitled.

programme.title: Icetastrophe
programme.desc: A piece of a meteor strikes the center of a small mountain town and causes deadly freezing temperatures.

programme.title: The Prisoner
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Jackie Chan ("Rush Hour") stars as an undercover police officer who infiltrates a deadly prison where a team of mercenaries is being assembled.

programme.title: Solar Attack
programme.desc: When the sun's increasing expulsions of plasma threaten to ignite methane in our atmosphere, international tensions rise while scientists race for a solution to avoid natural disaster.

programme.title: Battle of Kings: Bannockburn
programme.desc: This graphic docu-drama tells the story of the pivotal campaign of Scotland's King Robert the Bruce against King Edward II of England, culminating in the Battle of Bannockburn in 1314.

programme.title: Firepower
programme.desc: Two undercover cops risk it all by going deep inside a federally sanctioned haven of gambling, prostitution, drugs and violence, to bring down a psychotic criminal mastermind.

programme.title: Finding Noah
programme.desc: Follow a group of intrepid explorers as they climb and live atop a 17,000 ft mountain in Turkey to determine the final resting place of Noah's Ark. Narrated by Gary Sinise ("Forrest Gump").

programme.title: Nuts!
programme.desc: Meet Dr. John Romulus Brinkley, an eccentric genius who built an empire in Depression-era America with a goat testicle impotence cure and a million watt radio station. This Sundance award-winner from director Penny Lane uses animated reenactments, interviews, archival footage, and a hilariously unreliable narrator to trace Brinkley’s rise from poverty and obscurity to the heights of celebrity, wealth and influence in Depression-era America.

programme.title: Point and Shoot
programme.desc: Directed by Academy Award-winner Marshall Curry, Matthew VanDyke is on a journey of self discovery when he befriends a Libyan hippie who he fights alongside during the Libyan Revolution — camera in one hand, gun in the other.

programme.title: Little Dieter Needs To Fly
programme.desc: Werner Herzog's haunted tale of German-American pilot, Dieter Dengler, and his candid account of his imprisonment during the Vietnam war, complete with reenactments that are almost too real.

programme.title: Chernobyl: 30 Years On
programme.desc: 2016 marked thirty years since history's worst nuclear accident. Steps are still being taken to contain the radiation and stop leaks, but innovative new solutions must be found to protect people.

programme.title: Letter from Masanjia
programme.desc: An Oregon woman finds an SOS message from a Chinese dissident in a package of Halloween decorations, setting off a chain of events that exposes human rights violations and leads to sweeping labor reform in China.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: Episode 1
programme.desc: 'The Search'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Wait for Love
programme.desc: Best friends, Alex and Zory, find themselves both in chaotic relationships, accepting what they think is love. What begins as unhealthy, soon turns deadly.

programme.title: Kingdom Men
programme.desc: Pasto Gerald’s job is on the line if he doesn’t increase the attendance of the men in the church. He decides to have a men’s retreat hoping it will fix everything. Little did he know that he’s in for the fight of his life. He realizes God didn’t call him to increase the men at the church but help them.

programme.title: Queen: The Awakening
programme.desc: This is a story about Vampires and the struggle for rulership amongst the elders and elites. Humanity is at stake and if the wrong House is nominated for rulership it could be doom for the living.

programme.title: DWB: Dating While Black
programme.desc: DWB: Dating While Black is a very honest and comedic look at the dating process of through the eyes of several individuals. Two former co-workers, Eric and Alex, have been recently laid off of their jobs and they run into each other on a job interview. While searching for new jobs, they forge a personal relationship that involves Alex, a womanizing ladies' man, helping the naive and recently dumped Eric understand women better. Along the path are various dating scenarios from different characters that come in and out of the lives of both Alex and Eric who all demonstrate the struggles, strains, and triumphs of Dating While Black.

programme.title: Don't Shoot
programme.desc: After the unarmed shooting of William King, a college bound black teen, by two white officers, a city is on fire as it seeks justice in these times of racial division.

programme.title: Ambulance Girl
programme.desc: Kathy Bates, Michael Bach, David Michie, Robin Thomas, Nathalie Toriel, Gordon Pinsent, Kristina Nicoll The true story of food writer Jane Stern who overcame her depression and paralyzing phobias by becoming a volunteer emergency medical technician.

programme.title: Gambler V: Playing For Keeps: Night 1
programme.desc: Kenny Rogers, Loni Anderson, Mariska Hargitay Brady Hawkes has to run to his son's rescue once again in this continuation of the Gambler stories. Jeremiah is now a young man who has become involved with Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. Brady pursues the gang in order to get Jeremiah out of the gang before he gets in too much trouble with the law.

programme.title: Gambler V: Playing For Keeps: Night 2
programme.desc: Kenny Rogers, Loni Anderson, Mariska Hargitay Brady Hawkes has to run to his son's rescue once again in this continuation of the Gambler stories. Jeremiah is now a young man who has become involved with Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. Brady pursues the gang in order to get Jeremiah out of the gang before he gets in too much trouble with the law.

programme.title: The Baron And The Kid
programme.desc: Johnny Cash, Greg Webb, Tracy Pollan William “The Baron” Addington (Johnny Cash) is a former pool pro whose lifetime of boozing has cost him his career and family. In an attempt to straighten out his life, he quits drinking and plays pool only for charity.

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: The Redeemed and the Dominant: Fittest on Earth
programme.desc: elite athletes take on a series of grueling tests to vie for the title of 'Fittest on earth.' Follow the drama as they endure the unknown and unknowable during four of the most intense days of competition in CrossFit Games history.

programme.title: Shred America
programme.desc: Four twenty-year-olds travel from Chicago to New York on skateboards. Fueled by youthful ignorance, the four navigate America's landscape through a maze of wrong turns and unfortunate circumstances.

programme.title: Froning: The Fittest Man in History
programme.desc: Rich Froning Jr. is a legend in CrossFit and the Sport of Fitness. In this biopic, take a look at his childhood, follow his quest for a fourth CrossFit Games title, and see him as a son, a husband and a new father.

programme.title: FAT: A Documentary 2
programme.desc: FAT: A Documentary 2 is the sequel to the international sensation that delves deeper into the lies and myths surrounding the age old question: "What should I be eating?"

programme.title: All For One
programme.desc: A five year journey. Thousands of miles biked. Unlikely champions born. United by their renegade spirit and a determination to win against substantial odds, team members Mathew Hayman, esteban Chaves, Simon Gerrans, Matthew Keenan, Phil Liggett, and Robbie Mcewen show the true meaning of 'All for One. ' Follow the most tremendous Aussies on their long road to success becoming Australia's first ProTour cycling team.

programme.title: Stronger for Life
programme.desc: Follow an international fitness expert's inspiring journey from cancer to recovery proving her philosophy that physical exercise makes you stronger to face all of life's adversities

programme.title: Beyond Weight Loss
programme.desc: Beyond Weight Loss is a film that takes a hard look into the world of sustainable weight loss by exposing the fraud and deceit of diet industry and our government. Find out the truth behind fad diets, food labels and permanent fat loss.

programme.title: Cactus Flower
programme.desc: A bachelor talks his assistant into posing as his wife so he can avoid marrying his girlfriend.

programme.title: Sail A Crooked Ship
programme.desc: An incompetent burglar who boards a freighter with his gang of thugs, in order to escape after a bank heist, and becomes captain of the barely seaworthy freighter.

programme.title: The Taming Of The Shrew
programme.desc: A rambunctious version of Shakespeare's comedy about a rich merchant who has two daughters, one sweet, comely and shy and the other gorgeous but mean-tempered. The sweet-tempered daughter is being courted by several young men who are stunned when her father announces that she cannot marry until her sister does.

programme.title: Our Man In Havana
programme.desc: A vacuum cleaner salesman is recruited by the British secret service to act as a spy in Havana.

programme.title: Suspect
programme.desc: A public defender pokes into places she shouldn't while trying to exonerate an innocent man accused of murder. Edited for TV

programme.title: Sylvester
programme.desc: An unforgettable drama for the entire family, as a young girl risks everything for the horse only she believes in.

programme.desc: Eight young dancers from Ohio come to New York to compete in a dance contest and learn to survive in the city.

programme.title: Miracle Of The Heart: A Boys' Town Story
programme.desc: An inspirational story about two individuals who learned the value of believing in themselves.

programme.desc: A pair of grizzled frontiersmen and trappers search for a legendary valley rumored to be full of beaver.

programme.desc: An up-and-coming lawyer abandons his legal career to become a notorious Oklahoma bank robber.

programme.desc: A retired Texas Ranger and his three aging pals help to clean up a lawless town, run by a crooked mayor.

programme.title: Return of the Seven
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.desc: Screen giants Kirk Douglas and Anthony Quinn star in this taut Western thriller directed by acclaimed filmmaker John Sturges (Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, The Great Escape).

programme.title: Terror In A Texas Town
programme.desc: A greedy financier and a gang of gunmen force people to sell land.

programme.desc: The story of the life and work of the Canadian fur trapper who became a conservationist, Archie Grey Owl.

programme.desc: The military is pulling out of Fort Dodge leaving the civilians there with no future.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: After his friends Mr. Cousin is wounded and Mr. Brother is killed, Earp goes after the people who did it.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: A local girl wants to marry a painter but her family is against it. The painter was told by Buntline to ask Earp for help.

programme.desc: California learns he shares with six others an inheritance in which the survivors share equally as any of the others die. Murder ensues, so Hoppy begins an investigation.
